content: inv decrease x6 single_crochet = 7 single_crochet bobble leaving a long enough tail to sew the opening closed finish stuffing the body flattening the bottom so the body can stand up without tipping over using the yarn needle bring the tail up through the front loop of every stitch of round 5 pull the tail to gather the fabric and close the opening tie off the yarn and bury the knot into the body trim any excess hands make two with blue create an magic_ring round 1 single_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch into the single_crochet at the base of the chain 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet close ring single_crochet into first single_crochet of magic_ring = 5 stitches into magic_ring 1 single_crochet to form the bottom of the palm bobble inv join repeat for the second hand darksol diminutive devil king 6 arms make two with gray join to the final single_crochet of the hand row 1 chain 1 6 single_crochet in same st = 6 single_crochet twist the end of the row around on itself so the next stitch can be worked into the first stitch of the row and resume continuous rounds round 2-5 6 single_crochet = 6 single_crochet bobble inv join round 6 with blue join to final single_crochet of round 5 single_crochet in same st skip inv join 5 single_crochet = 6 single_crochet bobble leave long enough tail for sewing repeat for the other arm but flip the hand over before joining the gray yarn for row 1 e g the thumb created by the chain 2 should be to the right of the fingers instead of the left of the fingers a small gap is left at the end of row 1 tie off the tails for the hand just below this gap use the yarn needle to bring both tails for the hand up through the arm use the beginning tail of the gray yarn to close the gap at the end of row 1 then bring it up through the arm as well tie off the gray tails separate the bobble tail at the top of the arm do not trim this tail yet from the other yarn tails gather those other tails together and trim them to less than an inch long stuff the arm with the shortened tails using the yarn needle take the blue ending tail at the top of the arm and draw it through the front loops of each stitch on round 6 pull the tail to gather the fabric tie off and bury the knot into the arm bring the tail back out through a stitch gap in round 6 attach the arms position the arm at the roundest point of the shoulder base or the first left and eighth right bbsc of round 1 of the body the thumbs and fingers should point forward and upward when the arm swings forward the ending tail of the arm may need to be reinserted and exited through another stitch gap
